prTitle: feat: configure public assets and global styles
prBody:
## Summary

Completed implementation of task-lingerie-website-feat-project-setup-9 to configure public assets and global styles for the lingerie website project.

### Changes Made

**Public Assets Setup:**
- Created `public/` directory with proper structure
- Added `public/favicon.ico` (placeholder)
- Added `public/robots.txt` with SEO configuration
- Created `public/images/` directory structure
- Added `public/images/logo.svg` with branded placeholder logo
- Created `public/images/products/` directory with 3 placeholder product images

**Global Styles Implementation:**
- Created `src/styles/reset.css` with comprehensive CSS normalize and reset
- Created `src/styles/global.css` with extensive CSS custom properties:
  - Color variables (primary #d4567b, secondary, text, background, border colors)
  - Typography variables (font families, sizes, weights, line heights)
  - Spacing system based on 0.25rem base unit
  - Border radius, shadow, and z-index scales
  - Responsive breakpoints (mobile: 375px, tablet: 768px, desktop: 1024px, wide: 1920px)
  - Transition timing variables
- Added base typography and form element styles
- Included responsive design helpers and utility classes
- Imported global styles in `src/main.jsx`

### Acceptance Criteria Met
- ✅ `public/images/products/` directory created
- ✅ `public/images/logo.svg` placeholder added
- ✅ Global CSS file with CSS variables created
- ✅ Base reset styles applied
- ✅ CSS variables accessible in component styles

### Files Created
- `public/favicon.ico`
- `public/robots.txt`
- `public/images/logo.svg`
- `public/images/products/product-1.svg`
- `public/images/products/product-2.svg`
- `public/images/products/product-3.svg`
- `src/styles/global.css`
- `src/styles/reset.css`
- `src/main.jsx`

This establishes the foundational styling system that all other components will build upon, providing consistent theming, responsive design support, and a scalable CSS architecture.

Closes #72
